name: chad-gpt-server
author: Stefan Marinov, Mario Repas, Kirk Hugglund

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.clean: rm package-lock.json && rm -R node_modules && cd client && rm -R node_modules && rm package-lock.json && cd ../server && rm -R node_modules && rm package-lock.json
